description.value:
You gain a sixth sense that warns you of danger that might befall the target of the spell. If you choose a creature other than yourself as the target, you create a psychic link through which you can inform the target of danger. This link is a mental effect. Due to the amount of information this spell requires you to process, you can't have more than one foresight spell in effect at a time. Casting foresight again ends the previous foresight. While foresight is in effect, the target gains a +2 status bonus to initiative rolls and isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures or when flanked. In addition, you gain the following reaction: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VOEWhPQfN3lvHivK]{Foresight}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.X9Na6IK8FSPcTuoc]{Spell Effect: Foresight}
